title: Controversy Surrounds a Professor's Use of a Chinese Word | Peter Strzok & Samuel L. Jackson
itunes:title: Controversy Surrounds a Professor's Use of a Chinese Word | Peter Strzok & Samuel L. Jackson
description:
Ronny Chieng reacts to a controversy involving a Chinese word, ex-FBI agent Peter Strzok discusses "Compromised," and Samuel L. Jackson talks about his docuseries "Enslaved."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
